devdoc.details: It's compatible with the tool "openzeppelin/merkle-tree" that generates the merkle tree given      the data (root and proofs)

AddressEmptyCode(address).details: There's no code at `target` (it is not a contract).

AddressInsufficientBalance(address).details: The ETH balance of the account is not enough to perform the operation.

FailedInnerCall().details: A call to an address target failed. The target may have reverted.

SafeERC20FailedOperation(address).details: An operation with an ERC20 token failed.

claim(uint256,bytes32[]).details: The leaf hashing process is compatible with the tool "openzeppelin/merkle-tree" as it is,          ideally it should not be changed

params.amount_: amount of tokens to be claim, needs to match MT leaf
params.proof_: bytes32's array to prove that the claim belongs to the merkle tree           Use "openzeppelin/merkle-tree" to generate the tree and its proofs

params.token_: the ERC20 like token to be airdrop

devdoc.title: AirdropGovernance

userdoc.notice: This contract allows you to deploy a contract which, through a Merkle Tree, allows users to claim their preassigned tokens balances.
